about_the_game:
This is a unique classic 2D board game that will help you learn the traffic rules.

The features of the game are as follows:

1. The game supports multiple ways to play. you can choose to play against intelligent AI or play with your friends.

2. You can play with your friends in local mode up to 4 players, or share the joy of the game online with your steam friends.

3. The game uses cartoons 2D game graphics (up to 4K) with unique ideas and brings you an immersive gaming experience. Every detail is carefully designed to optimise the experience.

4. You can change the rules and adapt them to your playing style.

5. The game supports multiple handle operations, making your gaming experience more colorful. Whether you like to use the keyboard and mouse or the gamepad, you can find the most suitable operation method for you.

This game will bring you an unprecedented gaming experience, let you find fun in the game, learn, and compete with your friends.

name: The bicycle couriers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Learn the traffic rules in a playful way! In this game you are a bicycle courier who delivers parcels. If you deliver a package you receive money, but that doesn't get you there yet. You have to know the traffic rules and stick to them, otherwise you will end up in the hospital.
